item.title: Configuration
item.description: When I see something like this: 1 2 3 4 5 6 public class Config { public static final string DATABASELINK = "linkhere"; . . . } It sends a small, but chilling shiver down my spine. Just. don’t. There are a lot of possibilities to use configuration in Java. Java property files. Xml. Xml serialization. CSV file. Whatever suits you best, but this? DON’T!
